ivardefs.name: accident
ivardefs.desc: An accident which resulted in the need for healthcare services.

ivardefs.name: billablePeriod
ivardefs.desc: The billable period for which charges are being submitted.

ivardefs.name: careTeam_
ivardefs.desc: The members of the team who provided the overall service as well as their role and whether responsible and qualifications.

ivardefs.name: created
ivardefs.desc: The date when the enclosed suite of services were performed or completed.

ivardefs.name: diagnosis_
ivardefs.desc: List of patient diagnosis for which care is sought.

ivardefs.name: employmentImpacted
ivardefs.desc: The start and optional end dates of when the patient was precluded from working due to the treatable condition(s).

ivardefs.name: enterer
ivardefs.desc: Person who created the invoice/claim/pre-determination or pre-authorization.

ivardefs.name: facility
ivardefs.desc: Facility where the services were provided.

ivardefs.name: fundsReserve
ivardefs.desc: In the case of a Pre-Determination/Pre-Authorization the provider may request that funds in the amount of the expected Benefit be reserved ('Patient' or 'Provider') to pay for the Benefits determined on the subsequent claim(s). 'None' explicitly indicates

ivardefs.name: hospitalization
ivardefs.desc: The start and optional end dates of when the patient was confined to a treatment center.

ivardefs.name: identifier_
ivardefs.desc: The business identifier for the instance: claim number, pre-determination or pre-authorization number.

ivardefs.name: information_
ivardefs.desc: Additional information codes regarding exceptions, special considerations, the condition, situation, prior or concurrent issues. Often there are mutiple jurisdiction specific valuesets which are required.

ivardefs.name: insurance_
ivardefs.desc: Financial instrument by which payment information for health care.

ivardefs.name: insurer
ivardefs.desc: The Insurer who is target of the request.

ivardefs.name: item_
ivardefs.desc: First tier of goods and services.

ivardefs.name: organization
ivardefs.desc: The organization which is responsible for the bill, claim pre-determination, pre-authorization.

ivardefs.name: originalPrescription
ivardefs.desc: Original prescription which has been superceded by this prescription to support the dispensing of pharmacy services, medications or products. For example, a physician may prescribe a medication which the pharmacy determines is contraindicated, or for whic

ivardefs.name: patient
ivardefs.desc: Patient Resource.

ivardefs.name: payee
ivardefs.desc: The party to be reimbursed for the services.

ivardefs.name: prescription
ivardefs.desc: Prescription to support the dispensing of Pharmacy or Vision products.

ivardefs.name: priority
ivardefs.desc: Immediate (STAT), best effort (NORMAL), deferred (DEFER).

ivardefs.name: procedure_
ivardefs.desc: Ordered list of patient procedures performed to support the adjudication.

ivardefs.name: provider
ivardefs.desc: The provider which is responsible for the bill, claim pre-determination, pre-authorization.

ivardefs.name: referral
ivardefs.desc: The referral resource which lists the date, practitioner, reason and other supporting information.

ivardefs.name: related_
ivardefs.desc: Other claims which are related to this claim such as prior claim versions or for related services.

ivardefs.name: status
ivardefs.desc: The status of the resource instance.

ivardefs.name: subType_
ivardefs.desc: A finer grained suite of claim subtype codes which may convey Inpatient vs Outpatient and/or a specialty service. In the US the BillType.

ivardefs.name: total
ivardefs.desc: The total value of the claim.

ivardefs.name: type
ivardefs.desc: The category of claim, eg, oral, pharmacy, vision, insitutional, professional.

ivardefs.name: use
ivardefs.desc: Complete (Bill or Claim), Proposed (Pre-Authorization), Exploratory (Pre-determination).
